pr_title: follow symlinks in order to better support k8s secrets

timeline.bodyHTML:
createSymbolicLink isn't supported on all file systems so we probably should catch the UnsupportedOperationException it may throw and just skip the test in that case.

Suggested change
Files.createSymbolicLink(tempDir.resolve("key"), realKeyDir);
Files.createSymbolicLink(tempDir.resolve("pass"), realPassDir);
try {
Files.createSymbolicLink(tempDir.resolve("key"), realKeyDir);
Files.createSymbolicLink(tempDir.resolve("pass"), realPassDir);
} catch (UnsupportedOperationException e) {
throw new AssumptionViolatedException("Symbolic links not supported on this file system");
}
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: Good idea! Looks like that exception class comes from an older junit. junit-jupiter-api has a "TestAbortedException" - let me know if you want me to do something different.
